Rationale for Skill

  • Audit and compliance management in hybrid environments.
  • It provides rapid recovery as configuration is automated and documented with revision control
  • It improves the process by faster detection and correction of the inappropriate configuration which ultimately improves user experiences
  • It provides version wise data with version control
  • It reduces the risk of interruptions or sudden failures. It also keeps track of the changes made in the system and reduces the risk. Therefore, it also provides structured chain management and security
  • Configuration Management reduce software engineering costs providing more accurate and faster solution to the problem.

Roles for Skill

1 - Configuration management administrator

  • Setup and Administer the Configuration Items
  • Maintains access to the CM software

2 - Configuration management support engineer

  • Handles upgrade of the CM software
  • Own process improvement aspect of the CM
  • Support application teams in setting up their flows and testing

Work Related to Skill (Related Activities and Artifacts)

  1. Identify configuration items that must be Configured and Managed.
  2. Managing and monitoring Audit and reviews.
  3. Assuring certain process and policies are followed for creating, changing, and testing the management tool.
  4. Record, approve, track and report data regarding changes and implementation.
